text: The Goya Awards () are Spain's main national annual movie awards. The awards were created in 1987, a year after the founding of the Academy of Cinematographic Arts and Sciences. The first awards ceremony took place on March 16, 1987 in Madrid. The ceremony continues to take place annually at Centro de Congresos Pr√≠ncipe Felipe, around the end of January/start of February, and awards are given to movies created during the year before. ==References== Category:Movie awards Category:1980s establishments in Spain Category:1987 establishments in Europe
title: Goya Awards
